ygData.subject: Re: Twisting Questions
ygData.msgSnippet: Err, yeah, Berzerkers, not Celerity... Olgwinn Pendragun Bard of 48 Missed Notes (yes, I dinged tonight... hehe) PS:  Sorry to see you go Elfson! ...
ygData.messageBody:
Err, yeah, Berzerkers, not Celerity...

Olgwinn Pendragun
Bard of 48 Missed Notes (yes, I dinged tonight... hehe)


PS: Sorry to see you go Elfson!



> Date: Tue, 14 Nov 2000 10:35:35 -1000
> From: "Reece Tom R CPT 25 ID L G4(n)" <g4mntofcr@...>
>Subject: RE: Twisting Questions
>
>Just wondering why you would go with Celerity over Berserker in a group
>heavy with melee folks? Celerity adds a little more haste than Berserker,
>but Berserker will also increase STR and provide more AC than Celerity.
>IMO, the extra STR and AC from Berserker outweighs the slight haste bonus
>Celerity provides.
>
>Galtin
